name: glint-native-slides
description: A liquid-smooth local viewer for PowerPoint (.pptx) files.

scripts.version: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const m = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('manifest.json', 'utf8')); m.version = process.env.npm_package_version; fs.writeFileSync('manifest.json', JSON.stringify(m, null, '	')); const v = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('versions.json', 'utf8') || '{}'); v[m.version] = m.minAppVersion; fs.writeFileSync('versions.json', JSON.stringify(v, null, '	'));" && git add manifest.json versions.json
